website_summaries.verdict: This is a product designed to freshen up your aluminum boats, pontoons and canoe surfaces.
pros: Delivers a bright finish on your aluminum surfaces
Cleans up the dingy look left behind when you boat or pontoon sits in the water
Does a good job without requiring too much effort
cons: This is a harsh chemical and you definitely need gloves when you use this product

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product will exceed your expatiation's
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first purchasing this product but after using it I'm sold 110%. I used it on a very dirty Lowe Aluminum boat. Sprayed it on let it soak for 4 minutes not letting it dry then rinsed with water only one application and the aluminum looks like new. I tried it on the corner of the large Lowe boat decal and had no discoloration so did entire boat with NO damage to decals just a bright aluminum finish. Delivered on time very well packaged. Great product recommend it to everybody. I also used it on a set of 10" wide old school slotted rims for my hotrod and they look like new. Incredible product.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Last fall when I pulled the pontoon out of the water, I tried to clean the tubes with all the cheap environmentally friendly suggestions that a lot of people suggested on the forums. These didn't work for me. Over the winter I ended up buying this and it worked great. Sprayed it on and lightly scrubbed with Scotch Brite pad. Waited a few minutes and washed off with hose.
customer_reviews.author: GMoss

customer_reviews.title: Not good for new boats It etches the aluminum and very very hard to polish!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got a new pontoon boat and wanted to clean and polish the pontoons. This product seemed like the perfect product made for pontoons. It Cleaned the pontoons but etches the aluminum. When I went to polish the pontoons they were covered in oxidation!!! To polish the pontoons it takes approximately 50 towels and is very hard to penetrate the oxidation and polish. The towels turn black immediately, making the job extremely tedious and time consuming. After 3 hours I only got a two ft. section top to bottom Polished. I called a boat detailing co to finish the job. This may be OK for old boats but it will take a weekend to polish!!!
customer_reviews.author: Don P. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Incredible results for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used the product to clean up a 1954 Alumacraft that has likely never been cleaned since it was originally built. Can't believe what a difference it made! Some elbow grease required, for sure, but not nearly as much as I thought I was going to have to put into the job. After spraying on the aluminum and giving it a once-over with a, I let the section sit for about 4 minutes before hosing it down and scrubbing once more. Incredibly pleased with the product, would highly recommend this to anyone looking to clean up an old unfinished aluminum boat.
customer_reviews.author: copperheadclgp

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful
customer_reviews.text: Amazon kindly refunded this purchase because my bottle arrived too late. It turned out to be a good thing because the bottle leaked into the plastic bag in which it was shipped. The liquid Itself was extraordinarily corrosive and I managed to burn my left forearm with the rinse water In the effort to dispose of the contents of the bag and neutralize the exterior of the bottle itself. If you choose to use this product I would recommend goggles or a face shield, chaps to protect your legs, full arm- length gloves and a breathing apparatus designed for corrosive substances. Thankfully, I never actually used the cleaner because it arrived too late so I cannot comment on it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: W.B.

customer_reviews.title: Made my 1999 trailer look new again.
customer_reviews.text: Picture may be upside down bc iphone. worked really well on my aluminum boat trailer. Had some oxidation and it was just dull. Looked very bright when done. I used a one-gallon bleach sprayer to apply since the included sprayer seemed junky and inconvenient. It’s very strong so wear eye Protection and long sleeves/pants. It was a bit windy and it kept blowing back on me and it didn’t feel great. It’s acid after all. I sprayed on, let sit for a minute and then brushed with a car washing brush (be careful), then hosed off. Looks amazing. Don’t miss any spots, take your time and scrub everywhere, or save a little but for the spots you missed later.
customer_reviews.author: Enginepy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I used it on a pontoon boat I'm restoring and it removed YEARS of lake scum and alge that had been baked on by the sun. The pictures in the review are from a single pass with the cleaner and a scotch brite scrub pad (picked those up at Home Depot for about $4). You spray it on, let it work for a couple minutes, scrub the area, let is set for another minute or two and then rinse away the grime. I was blown away at how clean the toons came. I was able to clean (2) 20' pontoons with 1 bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Unger

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My 17' aluminum canoe has sat outside in the woods for almost 30 years and was never cleaned. It was covered in tree sap, dirt, and brownish crud. Set it on saw horses, sprayed this on, used a stiff bristle brush, and rinsed frequently with the hose, 2 hours later it shined inside and outside.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Northrup

customer_reviews.title: Not really clean just disguised
customer_reviews.text: Used to clean the stern of a 19' Alumaweld boat.This product leaves a white film over the entire area , which is obviously not clean just disguised.I attempted to clean the white coating using an automotive rubbing compound and had a black mess. 3 1/2 ' wide (1/2 the width of the stern) took appx 2 hours just to clean the black residue and still not reall clean. If you want to paint aluminum or have a shiny aluminum finish dont use this product. Buff with a clean buffing wheel and clean often for a truely clean surface.
customer_reviews.author: Lance H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning my aluminum pressure canner
customer_reviews.text: I used my All American pressure canner the other day, but I forgot to add vinegar to the water before canning. That caused the aluminum to stain - a lot. So, I tried this STAR BRITE cleaner, and it worked great. I had to spray it on, brush it, and clean it over three repetitive cycles to get it back to a clean, unstained condition. The fumes this stuff gives off are crazy, so next time, I'll a hazmat suite or something. This stuff really worked, and my guess is it will do the same for aluminum car wheels.
customer_reviews.author: GreyWolf

customer_reviews.title: Hallelujah
customer_reviews.text: My pricey aluminum boat trailer got that white oxidation pretty quickly. This product and a mild scrub ended all that. I am delighted with the results. So I tried it on some vintage 1970s Cragar mag wheels ( not chrome) . Beautiful. My experience with Aluminum cleaners is hit or miss. Most of them disappointed me. Not this time. This is good stuff. Worth the price in terms of effectiveness and saving time.
customer_reviews.author: Andy G

customer_reviews.title: Could Not Be Any Better
customer_reviews.text: Used this to restore my boat pontoons. I sprayed it on and agitated it with a rotating scrubber brush to speed up the process (make sure you wear gloves and eye protection if going this route), then left it on for a few minutes before rinsing. This stuff stripped years of grime, water marks, etc., down to bare, uniformly-colored aluminum. I was surprised by how easy it was and honestly amazed it did what it said it would do and then some. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe it Works!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased STAR BRITE Ultimate Cleaner and Restorer and can't tell you how happy we are that it works! The key thing to our purchases is that we followed the directions and gave it time! Rushing does not work. We are pleased with the results! Will tell everyone we know about our purchase(s) and recommend they make all of their purchase(s) from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: OldSpiritedOne

customer_reviews.title: great stuff if you give it time to work...
customer_reviews.text: used on moderately corroded aluminum boat...had turned very dark and had little dead" sea creatures" all over lower part of boat..followed directions and was disappointed at first...but started leaving it on for a longer period of time and was amazed at how good a job it did...very please with the outcome...great product and will use again if needed...
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: Stuff works great
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned and refurbished my 14' aluminum boat. Used medium steel wool and sprayed this cleaner on the steel wool. I wet down the boat first, and worked small areas. Be sure to rinse off quickly to avoid streaking, and wear a dust mask and safety glasses. The vapors will make you cough. Also wear gloves, it's not like acid that will eat your hands off..but I suppose with prolonged contact it would do a number on your skin. Overall it's a great product if you want to restore old alluminum.
customer_reviews.author: George Strong

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. You got to be carefully to be methodical and work from the bottom up. If you work from the top is streaks. Cleans better than anything I have ever used. When I built my trailer, some of the aluminum was stained. I tried a bunch of different cleaners and nothing worked. I used this stuff and it worked perfectly! You also have to give it time to work. But it certainly cleaned my trailer
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Works great when used properly.
customer_reviews.text: After trying different products I could never get the stains off my trailer. Then I used this stuff and thought I ruined the trailer but after letting soak for 10 minutes and scrubbing it with a scrub brush the trailer started to look brand spanking new again. Dont worry about spotting just keep it soak and let it sit it will clean evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Offshore-Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Spray on, hose off and really does cut through years of dirt and oxidation. Didn’t scrub at all, I wanted to see how it did just out of the bottle. This size easily cleaned a 40 foot aluminum ramp. Still have about a third left. I’ll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carjones

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Used this product on pontoons from a 2014 model. The oxidation wasn't very bad on these toons. After wetting the area first, then spraying from the bottom to the top. Next, I used a rough Scouring pad with handle to apply the product evenly. After three-four minutes I sprayed the area clean. I had to repeat this process 3 times before I achieved the desired results. I used about 3/4 of the 64 oz bottle to complete the job. Overall, I was satisfied with the product. I would definitely use rubber gloves when using. Also, be sure to keep the area wet and wash away from anything it gets on before it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lester

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of positive reviews on these products as well as watched a few YouTube videos which led to my purchase. The trigger sprayer that came with the bottle stopped working 5 mins into the process. I followed the instructions on the proper use starting at the bottom and working up and still had streaking issues. Luckily I had a trigger sprayer that o use for wheel brightener or I would have been unable to complete my customers boat. I found another cleaner for half the price for a gallon of product that's cut 4:1 and it worked marvelous. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: J martin

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works a little.... and I can assure you you will not be happy with the results unless you use a polish afterwards. I have found that you might as well skip this stuff and go straight to the polish. White Diamond is the best polish I've found.
customer_reviews.author: C2M

customer_reviews.title: Works Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I work with a small area (about 5ft at a time). Spray on from bottom up. Use gloves and a green scrubber pad and spread the solution around evenly on the surface. Use the scrubber pad and get all of the edges and detailed areas. Make sure the solution does not dry on the surface. Allow to sit for a couple minutes and spray another coat of cleaner on top of the existing cleaner. Use your pad to evenly spread it out. The solution should foam up. Allow to sit for 5 min and rinse thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: jaybo73

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. I needed to apply 3 times for a good result. Impressed with results. Leaked a fair amount when shipped. Not allowed to return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: DadeCityCharlie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great. It is strong stuff so I took my ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. It is strong stuff so I took my pontoon boat out of the water before to reduce any contamination. I also suggest using a face mask ass well as glasses ane rubber gloves. With all that said, the stuff works much better than power washing or scrubbing with Krudd-Cutter. I will use it again and recommend to other.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product produces amazing results as you can see in the picture. I probably put four light coats using a scrubbing sponge and rinsing between coats. I can't wait to finish the entire pontoon. The front already looks brand new. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but use but make sure you use in a well ventilated area.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this to clean my pontoon boat after sitting in the lake for 6 months. It’s easy to use but make sure you do it in a well ventilated area. Not much scrubbing, I’ve found just spraying it on generously and letting it work for about 4 minutes and then spraying off with a power washer works best!
customer_reviews.author: Hamptonman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic. Works very fast and doesnt require any scrubbing unless there is thick buildup. It'll strip aluminum faster than you'll come out of your clothes if you accidentally pour it on you!! With that said, wear protection, it is acid. Best buy of 2020 so far. Made that ole pontoon shine!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zach N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! I bought 4 bottles based on the recommendation of the other buyers, but it only took two to complete the job! Apply, wait three to five minutes and rinse. I had to scub a half a dozen places but the rest didn’t require any scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Product leaked during shipping.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the sealed box that the cleaner was shipped in it had leaked a significant amount of the solution in the box even though it had a plastic bag wrapped around the bottle. The bottle top was very loose and there was no foil seal beneath it. This seems to be an ongoing problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rockdoc

customer_reviews.title: Works well, strong stuff
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to clean my husbands fishing boat before listing for sale. Strong stuff! Make sure to wear gloves and mask and to keep other items away. It actually melted the plastic on a gas can we had nearby!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is A'mazing! Spray on, use the ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is A'mazing! Spray on, use the red scrubber, scrub and rinse off. Definetely follow directions and start at the bottom of Toon and work your way up in small 3-4' sections. Do NOT let it dry, keep a hose near while using. Also, wear a mask of some sort, it will take your breath. Only use when dry docked.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth a Try.
customer_reviews.text: Star Brite worked really well on my Pontoon boat. The before and after is pretty impressive. A couple of tips. Try to apply the product in the shade or during the morning or evening. The cooler the temp the longer the acid has to clean before it starts drying. Also don’t skimp on the scrubber. Just buy it you will be glad you did. The reason for four stars is the bottle of cleaner is much smaller than it appears in the photo. It was enough to clean two dirty pontoons but each treatment will require a new bottle. But like I said mine were really stained.
customer_reviews.author: JeffW

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous be careful unwrapping in cave it is damaged
customer_reviews.text: Whe No I opened it leaked and got on my shorts and shirt. Additionally,splashed on my face and floor. The cap came dislodged in shipping and leaked in the bag. There should be a protector under the cap. It is a mild acid and protective cap was not enough. Got on my hardwood floor and granite countertop but diluted with water right away. Burned my face and luck it didn’t splash in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Pruett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is worth its money. I posted picture for you to see. Sprayed the product from the bottom up like the instruction stated and waited about 1 minute then use a brush to spread the product all over and let sit for about another minute then sprayed once more and let sit for about two minutes then sprayed down with hose. That’s all.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rollo

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is some good stuff just read the instructions and think about it.. Get some acid protective gloves and do this in a very well ventilated space. make sure you have some Eye Protection, and yes wear old cloths and shoes. Be safe and watch some vids on the net.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty good on severely aged aluminum boat bottom, although it may take several coats. I wound up sanding the worst of the corrosion, which I expected using any chemical remotely environmentally safe. Overall it performed as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Harold M. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Pass!
customer_reviews.text: This did not work as advertised. Sprayed the back of the pontoon first, luckily. Even used the red scrub pads. Followed the directions, not happy at all and unable to return, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: jr64495

customer_reviews.title: Strong cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Should have taken before and after- used to clean a large cookpot, lid, and inside basket that appeared beyond repair. Used heavy duty gloves and aggressive scrubbing pad; sprayed product on, waited, scrubbed, rinsed, and repeated in problem areas. 220 grit sandpaper completed the job and now looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Danny S. Felts

customer_reviews.title: the best MAGICAL cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, Star Brite is the BEST boat cleaner I’ve found. Every year our seats get mildew and I found their mildew remover at our local hardware store and bought it based off Amazon reviews and it worked like magic!!! Since our boat is kept in the lake all year and got grimey from the wild fires i bought this cleaner and scrub brush and let me just say ITS MAGICAL. I am a forever believer and buyer in anything Star Brite! I cannot praise this brand enough!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Holtmeier

customer_reviews.title: Good but the jar leaks and I have stains in my new floor
customer_reviews.text: The jar leaks over my new tile and I can’t get out this horrible stains. I try to contact them maybe they can help me but didn’t get answer. It’s a good product to clean aluminum but be careful where you put the jar because it leaks
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Nuñez del Prado

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions to what label said - it ruined our aluminum on our new pontoon- turned the outside ones white and streaked the toons !!! I would like the maker and seller to contact me !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Magical! Buy this product to restore aluminum. It's NOT a polish. Just spray it on and wash off, it will restore the aluminum to it's original "color".
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Sit back and let it work!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Be sure to spray it on and let it sit for 5-10 minutes. I did a whole toon and scrubbed hard but only left it on for 2-3 minutes and really didn’t see any results. Finally I got wise and let the acid work it’s magic, and it really takes very little effort. Just spray, use a brush to spread it evenly, and after 5-10 minutes you wash it perfectly clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jake N.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is tough
customer_reviews.text: My first bottle came busted, probably by ups but they where quick to replace it. The stuff is good worked like a charm on both my aluminum boats.
customer_reviews.author: lorin acree

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I never thought my toons""" would ever look this good again this product is amazing Took off water stain and algae residue They look like the day I picked it up from the boat store
customer_reviews.author: P. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: After many years of hard scrubbing my boat I tried this product. One word to describe it. Incredible! Follow the instructions and you will save yourself a lot of time and effort. I WILL be using this again!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as advertised. Wear goggles, gloves and old clothes because it is acid based. It took off all the stains and made the pontoons look like new. A scouring pad and fine steel wool will help speed up the process.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Lamoureux

customer_reviews.title: Cleans oxidation on alluminum
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned the oxidation from years of saltwater air from aluminum storm windows. Highly toxic glove and mask recommended. Package states spray on and rinse which works but for had oxidation will require scrubbing. Toxic will stain everything else but aluminum
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't buy again...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product last year and it worked great. Bought it again this year and not only did the price increase by a third but also there was no sprayer included in the box ☹️ I have since been contacted and the issue was resolved in a timely manner. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet E. Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Was not as "powerful" as another product I have since switched to!
customer_reviews.text: Was not as "powerful" as another product I have since switched to! Better product: Duragloss 861 aluminum cleaner and brightener
customer_reviews.author: Wade Gizzy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny !
customer_reviews.text: Superb product. Easy to apply,minimal scrubbing effort. Almost made my ten year old Aluma trailer look new again !
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: It took the oxidation off out pontoon floats
customer_reviews.text: It took off years of oxidation anf so our pontoon looks like new, now if we could only get it our of the repair shop to enjoy it...lol..
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Used the product got great results
customer_reviews.text: Inherited an 81 sears gamefisher, the boat has been left out for several seasons. There was heavy oxidation and a heavy layer of build up. (See left side of photo) Used the product as directed and it took A lot of it off (right side of photo) Be sure to used gloves and eye protection and any other safety equipment recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jen238

customer_reviews.title: Give it time to work
customer_reviews.text: The original pic is actually after I sprayed the entire boat down. It actually was darker than that. One coat I left on a little longer (5 minutes) and then I hit it again to finish the bottle off (10 minutes) After first coat I thought "what a waste of money" but I never claimed to be patient. One thing I would mention is if you don't want the paint chewed up, mask off. I wanted to repaint mine anyways so it was not an issue. I'd say it's pretty impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Rudd

customer_reviews.title: This Product Works Wonders
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to do reviews but I had to for this product. This stuff works wonders. My boat was covered in filth and grime for years and I never thought I’d see the day where it shined again. Needless to say, this stuff did the truck. I simply sprayed the product onto my boat, let it sit for a few minutes, then using a scotch brite pad and some elbow grease I scrubbed away years of filth and grime. I would highly recommend this product to anyone wanting to restore a boat back to almost new looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Mason

customer_reviews.title: Watch for leaks
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works well! .. but unfortunately when I came the container had been breached and it has leaked all over the inside of the box and the plastic bag.... And making all the instructions non readable....you may consider sealing those plastic bags.The box is brought in because nobody knew it was a chemical.. . now I'm hoping that the stain will come out of my laminate floors ☹️
customer_reviews.author: David scott

customer_reviews.title: BOTTLE LEAKED ALL OVER EVERYTHING AND IS EMPTY.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS TTOTAL BS. ALL THE CONTENTS OF THE BITTLE LEAKED OUT I IT THE BAG GETTING EVERYTHING IN MY BOX SOAKED WITH CAUSTIC CHEMICALS.
customer_reviews.author: JOlson

customer_reviews.title: Stuff worked great on my t-top getting all contaminants off an getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Stuff worked great on my t-top getting all contaminants off an getting the aluminum ready to polish you have to scrub it with a scotch bright pad an it will look milky but that's what aluminum does with acid but after I hit it with a polishing ball it looks like a brand new top and arrived on time
customer_reviews.author: Avid Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and good strong product
customer_reviews.text: Those pontoons haven’t been cleaned in years and it cleaned them up nicer than I thought I could get them. Potent chemical make sure to use proper protective clothing when using and especially safety glasses not kidding there it contains an acid that will eat anything it touches
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good product not good shipping
customer_reviews.text: Product works pretty well, when it was delivered it was obvious that it leaked, when I open the There was no stick on aluminum seal I don’t know if there was supposed to be one but that’s why it leaked not a lot but it’s acI’d.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Before and after pics tell all! Easy to use, cleaned entire 18 ft pontoin and only used half of the container.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff did not work well at all. Had to scrub so hard and more than 6 different applications. Broke scrub brushes to get it clean. Not convinced this stuff did anymore than smell horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lusby

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Made a 11 year old aluminum radiator. Filled with gunk and build up look brand new. All the gunk rinsed​ off in 3 applications. With a little prep I will be able well in modified end tanks.😀
customer_reviews.author: Demon Camber

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff I didn't think it was going to work like the industrial stuff but damn it did just sprayed it on let it sit just like the big truck stuff and hosed it off then slapped some aluminium polish on and whammo I have a nice mirror shine on my wheels these wheels just my pickup truck but yeah if your wondering like I did "will this stuff work"? It works!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Cap was not sealed and leaked
customer_reviews.text: I am used to products like this to have a bottle seal under the cap so it doesn't leak. This bottle did not and about 25% of product leaked out. A bag caught some but most of the leaked product was absorbed by the packaging. I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: RonC

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned my pontoons with it they are clean now good stuff would buy again
customer_reviews.author: yenyan

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work
customer_reviews.text: Had a pontoon sitting in the water for several months. This product did not take off the algae growth at all.
customer_reviews.author: PlanetJ Corp

customer_reviews.title: Awkward white acid-like finish...
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come with the spray nozzle as advertised. After hunting down a junk spray bottle, I was shocked at how bad this product made our pontoons look. They look painted white; only with random algae-like brown spots sticking through. Can’t recommend this as a good solution for lake scum on aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: By far best value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought another product first that said it could do the job, not even close. Used this product and it is everything it says. It is very easy to use, did not use my power washer just hose. Easy and very fast.
customer_reviews.author: jim bolen

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 2018 pontoon to clean the runners of the boat. this stuff made them look worse than when i started. I only clean in small sections and followed the directions to a point. Even had someone else read them to make sure i was. now i had to get another product to fix what this has done to my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Turner

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great, but have to be extra careful not to get on certain textures. We just sprayed on, then waited few minutes and wiped with sponge and it clean really good.
customer_reviews.author: skippy

customer_reviews.title: No return policy even for broken container
customer_reviews.text: Product came with broken seal- liquid was all over the inside and outside of bag. And let me tell you- it burns severely when you get it on your skin. Item cannot be returned so don't waste your money on a bag of spilled chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Purchase Alumabrite instead!
customer_reviews.text: I had used alumabrite in the past with great success but I got this stuff and it just made a mess out of my pontoons.
customer_reviews.author: Floor Dude

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Be careful, it's strong. Spray, light scrub, rinse....like band new
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Cleaned bottom of pontoon to a new shine
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! Cleaned bottom of pontoon to a new shine, after sitting in the water all summer with slime on it
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Thames

customer_reviews.title: Holy poop, it really works!
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job of restoring the finish on my ATV engine, driveline and wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Hopalongcasualty

customer_reviews.title: Makes your toon's shine
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works great and I would have given it 5 starts except the pump handle is junk and very annoying to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great price for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Put a little elbow grease into it and your neigbors will ask how you got your pontoons so clean! I power washed then scrubbed with scotch brite with star brite and rinsed. My neighbors was so impressed. One gallon throughly cleaned 95% inside and out of my 24’ pontoon. Two toons.
customer_reviews.author: pittstom

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Please use with caution. Sparingly is advised. Works extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: It removed the build up from toons, lots of scrubbing. The product has fumes(caustic). You need safety equipment. Avoid skin contact. Wear eye protection.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Mefford

customer_reviews.title: Too pricey
customer_reviews.text: Not as large as I had thought. I obviously misread the size. I think the price is too much for the quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: What a joke I followed the directions and it did absolutely nothing. Complete waste of money. Also the container was cracked and leaked through the box and was still delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Candace F.

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: This was less expensive than the captain somebody or other product. But it worked great. It removed tarnish and shinned up my aluminum so it looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Wear gloves and proper PPE
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable how clean my wheels came, after I usually spend hours scrubbing them with no results. Star broke stands up to its values and standards. Only complaint I have is sprayer nozzle came in broken so I’m make shifting it to work but other then that product is awesome!! Highly recommend for aluminum rims!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff to clean pontoon toons!
customer_reviews.text: The is the best stuff I’ve every use to clean my toon on my boat. It almost took the water mark off them.
customer_reviews.author: William Steagall

customer_reviews.title: Bottles leaked and lost 1/4 of product in each bottle
customer_reviews.text: Definitely will not buy this again. Boxes were wet from the bottles leaking. At least 1/4 of each bottle leaked out. At $20 a bottle this is so not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.... Could be magic!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic! It worked where nothing else would.... Please follow all the instructions and safety instructions (especially in regards to breathing/a mask).
customer_reviews.author: Josh F

customer_reviews.title: Stained my pontoon!
customer_reviews.text: Ruined my pontoon! Changed the color, looks like crap now. I can only hope it fades in the salt water. Terrible product!
customer_reviews.author: Jack L

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my pontoons
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my pontoons, huge improvement. Suggest some sort of face mask / paint filter when applying though, as the fumes are strong.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Use protection
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned pontoons that were docked in water all last year. Make sure you wear eye and breathing protection for fumes
customer_reviews.author: Joe k

customer_reviews.title: Use a polish step with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I suggest 3m polish applied with wool buffer tool as a secondary step to get displayed result. Otherwise it will be clean but dull. Must rinse and move quickly to prevent stains.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D.

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit of effort, but this product cleaned extremely dirty aluminum pipe. I would definitely use it again.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Follow the instructions and ware protective equipment when using!
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Verrette

customer_reviews.title: Aluminum cleaner?
customer_reviews.text: This product should not be used to clean aluminum with a shine it removes all the shine and leaves a dull surface.
customer_reviews.author: Vince rosen

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use by following the instructions
customer_reviews.text: A little stinky but what an awesome result. Grab a mask and you’ll love the results. Watch the video and follow the instructions. Bottom to top, scrub, don’t let it dry on the toon and spray it off. My 2015 Bennington looks like new!!
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy
customer_reviews.text: Works great spray on and wait 5 min and pressure wash off and the rooms are like new. Had to spay on a couple of spots that were bad.
customer_reviews.author: Puddin0878

customer_reviews.title: strong stuff
customer_reviews.text: takes the alge right off, turned the tunes whites though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could stand to be a little cheeper but works great.
customer_reviews.text: This pontoon is older then I am. Its an 86 or something. Im sure its never been cleaned. Spray down the haull. Wipe/scrube it with a red scrub pad. And thats all I did. This works great with minamum effort. I onlt got two of thease and wanted to get this thing as done as i could. So im not so worried about the crap on the lower haull. Ill get those spots next year when i reuse this stuff and polish
customer_reviews.author: Delta

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: We cleaned the outside of our manufactured home we bought 3 and only barely opened the second one to finish also it did a good job paint now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Received leaking
customer_reviews.text: Leaked in shipment, lid was loose but only leaked a small amount. worked well on boat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: STAR BRITE Ultimate Aluminum Cleaner & Restorer - Safely Clean Pontoon Boats, Jon Boats & Canoes
product_meta.description: Style:64 Oz With SprayerStar brite is the marine industry's leading manufacturer of waxes, polishes, cleaners, teak finishes, motor oils, fuel additives and more. Because Star brite is run by avid boaters who test every item on their own boats, only the latest technology and highest-quality ingredients are used.
feature_bullets: Formulated to clean and restore stained or dull aluminum pontoon boats, Jon boats and canoes
Use Ultimate Aluminum Polish as step 2 when removing stains and restoring older boats
Convenient 64 fl. oz. size with sprayer for easy application

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars662 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
